title: 服务器登录问题
author: z173817010
txt_content:
登录时显示这样

服务器标语也是这样

这是什么问题

有人说是登录插件

首先 出现这个的原因因为authme 登陆插件 最新功能添加了国家禁止 ··无力吐槽中国被禁止 country_banned: Your country is banned from this server 打开这个 \服务端\plugins\AuthMe 再打开config.yml 使用工具搜索 countriesBlacklist: 把下面全部删除这是我在网上查到的像他说的这样做能进了，重启服务器有登不进去了是op能进，普通玩家不能进

Protection:  enableAntiBot: false  antiBotSensibility: 5  antiBotDuration: 10  enableProtection: false  countries:  - US  - GB  countriesBlacklist:  - A1VeryGames:  enableIpCheck: false上面是我登录插件的配置
求解决








QQ截图20170113025914.png
(47.1 KB, 下载次数: 1)




下载附件


2017-1-13 03:05 上传

replies.author: 3344520Z
replies.txt_content: 这是插件版本的问题！去下最新版的登录插件！希望采纳！下载地址就在中文论坛收得到！还是不知道就加我QQ我帮你弄！或者语音教你都可以！

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
AuthMe配置中
Protection: 
    enableProtection: false复制代码

replies.author: 139746a
replies.txt_content:
应该是配置文件里面修改下就好了
不然就是缺少文件geoip

replies.author: Day_music
replies.txt_content: 请问楼主是什么版本，然后就是配置对不对，或者你权限组出问题了

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
标题: [语言补丁][二次汉化]Unturned 3.x汉化补丁[版本3.17.12.1]网上教程害人
因为Authme部分版本有bug 登录保护无法禁用 所以请按照下面进行设置
官方的文档原文（部分） 
A1,"Anonymous Proxy"CN,"China"我的翻译：A1,"匿名的代理"CN,"中国"

[color=rgb(51, 102, 153) !important]复制代码

A1是匿名的代理 不需要删除
你只需要在
    # Countries allowed to join the server and register, see http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plu ... es/countries-codes/ for countries' codes    countries:    - US    - GB

[color=rgb(51, 102, 153) !important]复制代码

下面加上一行
    - CN

[color=rgb(51, 102, 153) !important]复制代码

即可

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content: a1294790523 发表于 2017-1-13 14:03 网上教程害人 因为Authme部分版本有bug 登录保护无法禁用 所以请按照下面进行设置 官方的文档原文（ ... 怎么回事 我重发一遍 因为Authme部分版本有bug 登录保护无法禁用 所以请按照下面进行设置 官方的文档原文（部分） A1,"Anonymous Proxy" CN,"China" 我的翻译： A1,"匿名的代理" CN,"中国"复制代码 A1是匿名的代理 不需要删除 你只需要在     # Countries allowed to join the server and register, see http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plu ... es/countries-codes/ for countries' codes     countries:     - US     - GB复制代码 下面加上一行     - CN复制代码 即可

replies.author: z173817010
replies.txt_content:
a1294790523 发表于 2017-1-13 14:05
怎么回事 我重发一遍

因为Authme部分版本有bug 登录保护无法禁用 所以请按照下面进行设置
Protection:
  enableAntiBot: false
  antiBotSensibility: 5
  antiBotDuration: 10
  enableProtection: false
  countries:
  - US
  - GB
  - CN
  countriesBlacklist:
  - A1
VeryGames:
  enableIpCheck: false
 是这样改么   还是就不去

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
z173817010 发表于 2017-1-13 15:58
Protection:
  enableAntiBot: false
  antiBotSensibility: 5
就这样改

replies.author: UNLH
replies.txt_content:
复制一下内容覆盖到你的config文件【全部覆盖】

DataSource:
  mySQLColumnName: username
  mySQLTablename: authme
  mySQLUsername: authme
  backend: file
  mySQLColumnLastLogin: lastlogin
  mySQLDatabase: authme
  mySQLPort: '3306'
  mySQLColumnIp: ip
  mySQLHost: 127.0.0.1
  mySQLColumnPassword: password
  mySQLPassword: '12345'
  caching: true
  mySQLlastlocX: x
  mySQLlastlocY: y
  mySQLlastlocZ: z
  mySQLColumnEmail: email
  mySQLColumnId: id
  mySQLlastlocWorld: world
  mySQLColumnLogged: isLogged
GroupOptions:
  UnregisteredPlayerGroup: ''
  RegisteredPlayerGroup: ''
  Permissions:
    PermissionsOnJoin: []
settings:
  sessions:
    enabled: true
    timeout: 60
    sessionExpireOnIpChange: false
  restrictions:
    allowChat: true
    allowCommands:
    - /login
    - /register
    - /l
    - /reg
    - /passpartu
    - /email
    - /captcha
    maxRegPerIp: 3
    maxNicknameLength: 20
    ForceSingleSession: true
    ForceSpawnLocOnJoinEnabled: false
    SaveQuitLocation: true
    AllowRestrictedUser: false
    AllowedRestrictedUser: []
    kickNonRegistered: false
    kickOnWrongPassword: false
    teleportUnAuthedToSpawn: false
    minNicknameLength: 3
    allowMovement: false
    timeout: 300
    allowedNicknameCharacters: '[a-zA-Z0-9_]*'
    allowedMovementRadius: 100
    enablePasswordVerifier: true
    ProtectInventoryBeforeLogIn: true
    displayOtherAccounts: true
    ForceSpawnOnTheseWorlds:
    - world
    - world_nether
    - world_the_end
    banUnsafedIP: false
    spawnPriority: authme,essentials,multiverse,default
    maxLoginPerIp: 0
    maxJoinPerIp: 0
    noTeleport: false
    allowedPasswordCharacters: '[a-zA-Z0-9_?!@+&-]*'
  GameMode:
    ForceSurvivalMode: false
    ResetInventoryIfCreative: false
    ForceOnlyAfterLogin: false
  security:
    minPasswordLength: 4
    unLoggedinGroup: unLoggedinGroup
    passwordHash: SHA256
    doubleMD5SaltLength: 8
    supportOldPasswordHash: false
    unsafePasswords:
    - '123456'
    - password
  registration:
    enabled: true
    messageInterval: 5
    force: true
    enableEmailRegistrationSystem: false
    doubleEmailCheck: false
    forceKickAfterRegister: false
    forceLoginAfterRegister: false
  unrestrictions:
    UnrestrictedName: []
  messagesLanguage: cn
  forceCommands: []
  forceCommandsAsConsole: []
  useWelcomeMessage: true
  broadcastWelcomeMessage: false
  delayJoinMessage: false
  applyBlindEffect: false
  forceRegisterCommands: []
  forceRegisterCommandsAsConsole: []
ExternalBoardOptions:
  mySQLColumnSalt: ''
  mySQLColumnGroup: ''
  nonActivedUserGroup: -1
  mySQLOtherUsernameColumns: []
  bCryptLog2Round: 10
  phpbbTablePrefix: phpbb_
  phpbbActivatedGroupId: 2
  wordpressTablePrefix: wp_
Xenoforo: {}
permission:
  EnablePermissionCheck: false
BackupSystem:
  ActivateBackup: false
  OnServerStart: false
  OnServerStop: true
  MysqlWindowsPath: C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 5.1\\
Passpartu:
  enablePasspartu: false
Security:
  SQLProblem:
    stopServer: true
  ReloadCommand:
    useReloadCommandSupport: true
  console:
    noConsoleSpam: false
    removePassword: true
    logConsole: false
  captcha:
    useCaptcha: false
    maxLoginTry: 5
    captchaLength: 5
Converter:
  Rakamak:
    fileName: users.rak
    useIP: false
    ipFileName: UsersIp.rak
  CrazyLogin:
    fileName: accounts.db
Email:
  mailSMTP: smtp.gmail.com
  mailPort: 465
  mailAccount: ''
  mailPassword: ''
  mailSenderName: ''
  RecoveryPasswordLength: 8
  mailSubject: Your new AuthMe Password
  maxRegPerEmail: 1
  recallPlayers: false
  delayRecall: 5
  mailText: 'Dear <playername>, \n\n This is your new AuthMe password for the server
    \n\n <servername> : \n\n <generatedpass>\n\nDo not forget to change password after
    login! \n /changepassword <generatedpass> newPassword'
  emailBlacklisted: []
  emailWhitelisted: []
Hooks:
  multiverse: true
  chestshop: true
  bungeecord: false
  notifications: true
  disableSocialSpy: true
  useEssentialsMotd: false
Performances: {}
Purge:
  useAutoPurge: false
  daysBeforeRemovePlayer: 60
  removePlayerDat: false
  removeEssentialsFile: false
  defaultWorld: world
  removeLimitedCreativesInventories: false
  removeAntiXRayFile: false
Protection:
  enableProtection: false
  countries:
  - US
  - GB
  enableAntiBot: false
  antiBotSensibility: 5
  antiBotDuration: 10
  countriesBlacklist:
  - A1
VeryGames:
  enableIpCheck: false

之前我也遇到过这样的问题，对于此插件颇有研究
